methods.name: Focus
methods.description: Sets focus on the widget element, if it can be focused and keyboardOperation=true

methods.name: Freeze
methods.description: Ends the graph data update and makes it possible to use the zoom and scroll functions.

methods.name: GetStatus
methods.description:
This action is used to determine whether the graph is in freeze mode.
If true is returned, freeze mode is not active.

methods.name: ScrollDown
methods.description:
Scrolls down 25%.
To do this, the widget must be in freeze mode.

methods.name: ScrollLeft
methods.description:
Scrolls left 25%.
To do this, the widget must be in freeze mode.

methods.name: ScrollRight
methods.description:
Scrolls right 25%.
To do this, the widget must be in freeze mode.

methods.name: ScrollUp
methods.description:
Scrolls up 25%.
To do this, the widget must be in freeze mode.

methods.name: setAdditionalStyle
methods.description:
Add an additional style to the widget element. The initial style will not be removed.
The additional style will not be removed, when the style of the widget is changed.
You can remove the additional style via removeAdditionalStyle.

methods.name: setCursor
methods.description: Set property value of single cursor

methods.name: SetCursorStyle
methods.description: Sets style of cursor

methods.name: SetCursorVisible
methods.description: Sets visibility of cursor

methods.name: setEditable
methods.description:
Sets the state of property «editable»
Used for «editable» binding; method is called exclusevely by the framework

methods.name: SetEnable
methods.description: Sets the state of property «enable»

methods.name: setGraph
methods.description: Set property value of single graph

methods.name: SetGraphStyle
methods.description: Sets style of graph

methods.name: SetGraphVisible
methods.description: Sets visibility of graph

methods.name: setParentCoWiId
methods.description: Used to inherit parentCoWiId inside of compound widgets to inner widgets which are not projected, e.g. inner widgets of Login widget

methods.name: SetSelectedCursor
methods.description: Sets a specific cursor active

methods.name: SetStyle
methods.description: Sets new style to the widget.

methods.name: setTabIndex
methods.description: Sets the state of property «tabIndex»

methods.name: setUpdateChartTime
SetVisible
methods.description: Sets the state of property «visible»

methods.name: SetXAxisPosition
methods.description: Defines weather the axis is positioned at the top or bottom in the chart.

methods.name: SetXAxisStyle
methods.description: Sets style of xAxis

methods.name: SetXAxisVisible
methods.description: Sets visibility of xAxis

methods.name: setYAxis
methods.description: Set property value of single yAxis

methods.name: SetYAxisPosition
methods.description: Defines weather the axis is positioned at the right or left in the chart.

methods.name: SetYAxisStyle
methods.description: Sets style of yAxis

methods.name: SetYAxisVisible
methods.description: Sets visibility of yAxis

methods.name: SetZoomType
methods.description: Defines on which Axis zomming is enabled

methods.name: ShowTooltip
ToggleCursorTable
methods.description: Toggle cursorTable visiblity to show/hide cursor values in freeze mode.

methods.name: Unfreeze
methods.description: Restarts the update of the graph data and prevents the zoom and scroll functions.

methods.name: Update
methods.description:
used to update the data of a certain graph while in freeze mode or
updateChartTime is 0

methods.name: ZoomIn
methods.description:
Zooms in the graph by 20%.
To do this, the widget must be in freeze mode.

methods.name: ZoomOut
methods.description:
Zooms out the graph by 20%.
To do this, the widget must be in freeze mode.

methods.name: ZoomReset
methods.description:
Resets the zoom to 0 %.
To do this, the widget must be in freeze mode.

events.name: Click
events.description: Fired when element is clicked on.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: DisabledClick
events.description: Fired when disabled element is clicked on.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: hasPermission
parameter.description: defines if the state is caused due to missing roles of the current user

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: EnableChanged
events.description: Fired when operability of the widget changes.

events.name: FocusIn
events.description: Fired when the widgets gets focus

events.name: FocusOut
events.description: Fired when the widgets lost focus

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

events.name: VisibleChanged
events.description: Fired when the visibility of the widget changes.

properties.name: enable
properties.description: Initial option to enable widget.

properties.name: permissionOperate
properties.description: restricts operability to users, which have given roles

properties.name: permissionView
properties.description: restricts visibility to users, which have given roles

properties.name: style
properties.description: reference to a style for this widget type

properties.name: tabIndex
properties.description:
sets if a widget should have autofocus enabled (0), the order of the focus (>0),
or if autofocus should be disabled (-1)

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: reference to a tooltip for a widget

properties.name: updateChartTime
properties.description: Interval in ms in which the chart is redrawn.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: change visibility

properties.name: zoomType
properties.description: Defines for which axes zooming should be possible.

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: maximum outer height of widget

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: minimum outer height of widget

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.description: maximum outer width of widget

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description: minimum outer width of widget

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description:
The zIndex property specifies the z-order of a widget and its childs.
When widgets overlap, z-order determines which one covers the other. A widget with a larger zIndex generally covers a widget with a lower one.
The zIndex must be unique within a content.

properties.name: left
properties.description: absolute position measured from left boundary of parent container

properties.name: top
properties.description: absolute position measured from top boundary of parent container

properties.name: height
properties.description: outer height of widget

properties.name: width
properties.description: outer width of widget

descriptions.de: Widget zur Anzeige von Daten als eine Gruppe von Punkten, von denen jeder den Wert einer Variablen hat, die die Position auf der horizontalen Achse bestimmt, und den Wert der anderen Variablen, die die Position auf der vertikalen Achse bestimmt
descriptions.en: Widget to display data as a collection of points, each having the value of one variable determining the position on the horizontal axis and the value of the other variable determining the position on the vertical axis

structuredproperties.name: cursor
structuredproperties.description: Defines appearance and behaviour of the cursor instances

properties.name: style
properties.description: Reference to a style that can be created by the user.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Defines the visibility of the cursor. (Visible = true, invisible = false)

Description: Color of the cursor

structuredproperties.name: graph
structuredproperties.description: Defines appearance and behaviour of the graph instances

properties.name: cursor1NodeX
properties.description: Defines the cursor intersection of the graph.

properties.name: cursor1NodeY
properties.description: Defines the cursor intersection of the graph.

properties.name: cursor1ValueX
cursor1ValueY
cursor2NodeX
properties.description: Defines the cursor intersection of the graph.

properties.name: cursor2NodeY
properties.description: Defines the cursor intersection of the graph.

properties.name: cursor2ValueX
cursor2ValueY
nodeX
properties.description: Defines the data source of the graph.

properties.name: nodeY
properties.description: Defines the data source of the graph.

properties.name: numberOfSamples
style
properties.description: Reference to a style that can be created by the user.

properties.name: valueX
valueY
visible
properties.description: Defines the visibility of the graph. (Visible = true, invisible = false)

properties.name: xAxisReference
properties.description:
Specifies the id of the xAxis that has to be associated with this graph.
The xAxis defines the display unit and scales with the graph when autoscaling.

properties.name: yAxisReference
properties.description:
Specifies the id of the yAxis that has to be associated with this graph.
The yAxis defines the display unit and scales with the graph when autoscaling.

Description: Color of the line graph
Color of the line graph when widget is disabled
Width of the line graph

structuredproperties.name: xAxis
structuredproperties.description: Defines appearance and behaviour of the xAxis instances

properties.name: format
properties.description:
NumberFormat for every measurement system.
Defines the number format of the labels.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Defines the maximum range if rangeMode is set to fromConfiguration. This value has no unit and will not be converted!

properties.name: min
properties.description: Defines the minimum range if rangeMode is set to fromConfiguration. This value has no unit and will not be converted!

properties.name: numberOfTicks
properties.description: Reference to a style that can be created by the user.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Defines weather the axis is positioned at the top or bottom in the chart.

properties.name: rangeMode
properties.description: Defines how the range is drawn. If rangeMode fromConfiguration is used the range is static and will not be converted!

properties.name: showUnit
properties.description: Defines whether the unit should be displayed.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Reference to a style that can be created by the user.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title of axis.

properties.name: unit
properties.description: Unit code for every measurement system.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Defines the visibility of the graph. (Visible = true, invisible = false)

The zIndex property specifies the z-order of a widget and its childs.
When widgets overlap, z-order determines which one covers the other. A widget with a larger zIndex generally covers a widget with a lower one.
The zIndex must be unique within a content.
